evidence.claim: Work.software utilizes AWS for cloud services, ensuring scalability and reliability.
The platform supports FHIR for health data interoperability.
Integration with Snowflake for data warehousing solutions is apparently a key feature.
Work.software discusses API integration patterns extensively in their documentation.
HL7 standards are mentioned in the context of data exchange for healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of involvement in X12 or clearinghouse activities found on site.
